class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting
class.query: select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs where cs.activityStatus = 'Active'
select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs join cs.property prop join prop.module module where cs.activityStatus = 'Active' and module.name = :name
select cs from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.ConfigSetting cs where cs.activityStatus = 'Active' and cs.id > :settingId
